website_summaries.verdict: This supplement is a little pricey, but according to users, it does help to improve your sleep and mood.
pros: Designed to help boost your mood and give you more energy
May improve the quality of your sleep
cons: This product is expensive for a 60-day supply

customer_reviews.title: This helped me with two things I've struggled with for ...
customer_reviews.text: This helped me with two things I've struggled with for a while: waking in the middle of the night and waking with anxiety in the morning. I had tried many many things to fix either one and nothing helped. I'm ordering my 3rd bottle because this is all that helps me...and it helps 100% with both. 5 days of not taking it and I have anxiety again in the morning. This is my saving grace!
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Side Effects!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not review products online but felt compelled to do so with this one. I started taking about one pill per night two weeks ago. I would fall asleep but then wake suddenly and alertly throughout the night. Also experienced night sweats and extreme "fog" and exhaustion the next day. I stopped taking them for about a week during which all of the above symptoms completely went away. Then I took one last night just to make sure it was indeed the Cortisol Manager making me have those symptoms. Oh boy. Today I have a pounding headache, increased heart rate, and EXTREME agitation, anxiety, and depression, along with "brain fog" and exhaustion. Bad, bad, bad.
customer_reviews.author: aub333

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I have been using this since 2015 with very good results. Due to cortisol levels that turned my sleep cycle upside down, I was not sleeping more than a few hours a night. this has helped get things turned back around to more normal levels. Without this supplement, I do not sleep well, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zayantegirl

customer_reviews.title: Headache and groggy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken Cortisol Manager for three nights. I slept better but I still woke up multiple times. Those times were brief and I fell back to sleep quickly. Upon waking each morning, I had a bad headache that made me feel “off”. I’ve also felt more tired and lethargic during the day. I had high hopes based on the many positive reviews. I contacted the company and was told to discuss the side effects with my doctor. I was going to try it one more time but in light of that, I’m going to discontinue use. I just don’t do well with it. The side effects are too concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Blueflame

customer_reviews.title: Best brand on the market
customer_reviews.text: Highest quality cortisol manager available. World-wide, top rated SANOVIV Medical Institute uses this brand in their medical hospital. I've used it for 2 years and will continue to purchase. Meets all claims for body systems supports and helps regulate sleep patterns and supports stress hormones. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Doty

customer_reviews.title: Stopped My Morning Migraines!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my integrative MD for the migraines I had been waking up with for years. While one pill a night didn't work, 2 per night was the charm. In the 2 weeks I've been using it, I've only wakened with a headache 2 or 3 times. What a welcomed relief! It was clearly a cortisol issue.
customer_reviews.author: High Desert Diva

customer_reviews.title: Read ALL reviews before purchase! Bad side efffects
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying this before I read all of the reveiws... I slept ok, but woke early with HORRIBLE headaches, BP skyrocketed, I took it for a couple of nights and even after I stopped its taking awhile to get out of my system. If you have any medical issues, I would definitely think twice or ask your doctor before trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Beck

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It’s 3:30 AM and here I am awake in my bed. Yes, you guessed it. This magic pill does not work for me. 😕
customer_reviews.author: GLB

customer_reviews.title: May cause your heart to race...
customer_reviews.text: I woke up with my heart racing in the middle of the night: discontinuing use immediately. Still wide awake...the exact opposite of product description.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited t try this out based on the reviews. Unfortunately it seems to have made my sleep worse. I had extremely vivid dreams and woke up every 2 hours. I ended up waking up with a migraine and totally exhausted. Probably one of the worst nights of rest I’ve had in my life. Then again I have horrible sleep every night.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product to help me sleep and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help me sleep and it has helped me sleep all through the night, but it has also helped me deal with stress. I have been really tightly wound and felt my blood pressure sky rocket and irritable for sometimes what it felt for no reason. This supplement has given me a sense of peace. I am almost out so I bought another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Eligible for Return
customer_reviews.text: Please beware, was really excited about this product but in my haste, I didn't realize it contains soy
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia Alicia Steensen

customer_reviews.title: Wake up rested, no side effects
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I don’t typically have sleep problems, but we are under lots of new stress and it seems to help with both. I feel like it helps me fall asleep fast and stay asleep all night. My daughter can come wake me in the middle of the night and i go right back to sleep. I take half bc medication of any kind affects me strongly. My husband, who wakes up stressed out often, takes 2 and says he wakes up feeling well rested and in a positive mood. The first two days I felt a bit groggy the next morning but after that, I’ve feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Webber

customer_reviews.title: ADD sleep angel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this as an alternative to Melatonin, and it works great. I have ADD, and I sometimes have anxiety induced insomnia. It only happens the night before a big event, it could be my birthday, a big test, a big trip, christmas, a class presentation, etc. and I’d stay up all night maybe get 10-15 minutes of sleep every hour or two. This knocks me out for the whole night. I’d recommend this to anyone that needs a little extra help with sleep
customer_reviews.author: A & S Ray

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for sleep but didn't work for me. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for sleep but didn't work for me. Has a reaction the third day of using it. I'm 67 yrs old and had a spot of blood. Stop using them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Issadora

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of my cortisol manager in capsules so I bought these. It stopped working. Then when I took this bottle to my doctor she said this isn’t real because this company (on the bottle doesn’t make tablets and it’s probably a scam. I threw them out and started the capsules she has (that you cannot find online) And it started working again. I say just find a natural path to buy these from.
customer_reviews.author: Lil marshmallow

customer_reviews.title: Won't go without it again!
customer_reviews.text: Greatly helped me sleep through the night after only a few days of taking it. I struggled with falling asleep, as well as waking around 2 am most nights! So thankful for this product ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy it Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t have given it one star except I couldn’t post. This simply does not work. I question the postive reviews on here
customer_reviews.author: badboypaul

customer_reviews.title: It works..
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product over the last year. It definitely works.. Generally it works within 30 mins.. I sleep at least 5 hours per night. If I wake up in the middle of the night its for a few minutes and then I can go back to sleep. I definitely feel more rested when I take them.
customer_reviews.author: First Lady

customer_reviews.title: Started losing weight right away, After years of wondering ...
customer_reviews.text: Started losing weight right away, After years of wondering why I wasn’t able to. 25 lbs. down so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Chenette

customer_reviews.title: A huge improvement in my sleep!
customer_reviews.text: With all of the uncertainty in the world right now, it's probably difficult for anyone to get a good night's sleep. And when you're stressed about money, it's dialed up even more. Before the pandemic, I was struggling to get more than five hours of sleep a night. After pandemic-related job insecurities began keeping me awake, that number dwindled to 2-3 hours a night. Nothing seemed to turn off my over-processing until I tried the Cortisol Manager. What a difference. I'm no longer waking up and staring at the ceiling. And combined with an occasional melatonin, I'm falling asleep much earlier in the evening. As a result, I'm much more productive during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Weave™

customer_reviews.title: I'm calmer and I am sleeping so much better. I did have to adjust the time of ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a God send. My FMD started me on it a few months ago and I feel such a major difference in my mood. I'm am not having major mood swings, I'm calmer and I am sleeping so much better. I did have to adjust the time of day that I take it to afternoon and evening, first thing in the morning and it makes me groggy. I will be staying on this product as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Steph1219

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: This product simply didn't work for me. No difference in sleep.
customer_reviews.author: R. Christie

customer_reviews.title: Sleep needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this product after doing a whole bunch of research after seeing it on someone's instagram story. I have a hard time relaxing at night, my body gets tired, but my mind does not want to shut off. This helps my mind ease and relax at the same time that my body does. Depending on how stressful my night is I will take 1 to 2 pills. If I take two pills, I do feel a tiny bit drowsy the next day, but not as much as melatonin or any other sleeping drug. I would recommend starting with a half a pill and working your way up based off of your stress level and active mind.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Avellino

customer_reviews.title: Negative reaction
customer_reviews.text: I too had an opposite reaction to this product then was intended. Was awake half of the night. For me it was like speeding me up rather then calming me down.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: These supplements are great! I was waking up every night between 12
customer_reviews.text: These supplements are great! I was waking up every night between 12:30 to 2:00. Needless to say my Adrenals were burned out. My Naturopath recommended this. Wow! These have made all the difference. I am able sleep through the night and wake up feeling refreshed. Not groggy like I did with melatonin. That too is a great product but my body responded to this one much better.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: count the pills
customer_reviews.text: I got my order yesterday, and for some odd reason decided to count them. Well, I received 28 pills in the bottle instead of the 30 that should have been in there. I even counted them 4 times, come on people......Obviously I'm assuming this didn't happen at Amazon, but wherever the product came from.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Rees

customer_reviews.title: hard time believing
customer_reviews.text: Usually over the counter meds do nothing for me, I'm a big guy. I've been struggling with sleep lately due to some medical issues. I have Xanax, but I feel so crappy in the morning, and don't like that they are addictive. Advil PM's didn't do anything. My wife was taking these and offered me one. I now fall to sleep very quickly, and feel like normal in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This was a game changer for me
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this when I was having trouble sleeping due to situational anxiety. I used nightly for a couple of months, at bedtime, and was able to get to sleep and stay asleep easily. Now, with improvement in the anxiety situation, I use it if I've been tossing for more than 30 minutes, and it always works. Because its calming rather than sedating, I have no problem waking up in the morning. I now recommend it to every woman who tells me they are having trouble sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: They are worth every $$$
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed my sleeping patterns. I sleep threw the night, wake up refreshed. It's expensive,but how much would you spend for a good night's sleep? I have given these natural vitamins to my friends , everyone of them are experimenting a full nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: If you need more zzzzz's take some of these!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for those with stress induced insomnia. Really helps me chill out and relax into sleep. Per my doctor, it can be safely paired with low dose sublingual melatonin for those super stressed out days when you can't shut your mind off and meditation isn't cutting it.
customer_reviews.author: AcuSeren

customer_reviews.title: Great cortisol adjuster
customer_reviews.text: If you have cortisol levels that are out of whack this can be a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: A's Mom

customer_reviews.title: No Luck
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, did nothing for me and were highly recommended by hormone specialist as I am in the "savage passage" as she calls it, "Menopause". Exercise worked in a way these did not. I took the entire bottle and did not return with the hope they would work. Have heard nothing but rave reviews but clearly body chemistry is so personal.
customer_reviews.author: Lilac Bouquet

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with my anxiety, which i found is ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps me with my anxiety, which i found is caused by high cortisol levels. Worked wonders for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wildebeest

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product It made me feel so released. I didn’t care for the world the next day!! I never felt this calm and happy before ! I have been struggling with anxiety depression for over 7 years now . For the first time I felt so good and normal !! I’m hooked
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: A well rested mom makes everyone happy!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these for my mom. She's tried everything and these are the only pills that help her sleep through the night. They are more expensive than other options, but these are the only ones that work for her so they are worth it. A well rested mom makes everyone happy!
customer_reviews.author: LoriCO

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for approximately 5 years. Cortisol Manager helps me to relax so I can go to sleep. I have never had any morning drowsiness after taking it. The only reason for four stars is that it is costly.
customer_reviews.author: catdogmouse3

customer_reviews.title: Side Effects Are Bad
customer_reviews.text: I never leave a review but due to the cost and promise made I felt it was necessary. 3rd night I experienced sweating, heart racing, anxiety, stomach upset & horrible headache. Next morning headache last all day and I felt worse then before. Be careful if you have underlying conditions to your insomnia this is not the answer. I'm going back to tinctures like Valerian root, etc. all in liquid form seems to help. I was just trying to get really good sleep but was sadly disappointed. When side effects are severe I must warn others not to risk their health.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: This may work but I didn't get a chance to find out because it gave me an allergic reaction--sore throat and mucus in my throat bad enough to keep me awake all night. Not the outcome I was hoping for (better sleep)!
customer_reviews.author: katelands

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep supplement!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try since I have struggled with insomnia for years. Other supplements I have tried did not work for me, such as melatonin. For the first few days I didn’t notice any difference. I decided to stick with it and then all of a sudden I started falling asleep easily and staying asleep. I’ve been taking it now for a couple months and can honestly say that I’ve been sleeping well and feel great. I have not had any side effects from this supplement. I would highly recommend giving this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dubious of these "cortisol reducers". It sounded a bit hokey, yet after a severe systemic illness I found myself having a very difficult time getting any sleep. Much to my pleasant surprise, starting the very first night I took one of these babies, I no longer woke up all night long and instead, the next thing I knew it was morning. I've been waking up refreshed and also remembering my dreams, which hadn't happened since I had gotten sick. I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy/shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not feeling good
customer_reviews.text: These worked at first but after taking them three nights in a row I developed a headache and felt very groggy in the daytime. After that I cut a few pills in half and took them infrequently, but I realized that they make me feel terrible. Woke up so groggy and sick feeling this morning. Concerning. Not taking it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cortisol control product
customer_reviews.text: My doctor put me on this to help control cortisol levels and it works very well. Feeling much better. Takeven in the late afternoon or evening.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. People must of been paid for their reviews. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Eraina Maginnis

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Product did not help, kept me up worse than when I did not take it and I was very tired next day
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Only 29 pills in 30-count bottle
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the effectiveness of these yet, but there are only 29 pills in a 30-count bottle. This is unfortunately not the only review that mentions this problem and it's totally unacceptable for a reputable company. For such low quality control at this price, I won't be purchasing this item again.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Finally - Better Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that allows for a little more peaceful sleep at night. I was waking up a LOT and sleeping restless, and the second I took CM my first night's sleep was already a VAST improvement from where I was before.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Helping with heart palpitations and sleep
customer_reviews.text: My cortisol level is way off, giving me heart palpitations. After taking the cortisol manager it is controlled. My PN suggested I get this brand of cortisol manager off Amazon. The pill is a bit big, though I do not have any problems swallowing it, others may.
customer_reviews.author: Tone Iverson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE. I’ve taken this before and bought from a more reliable source. That stuff worked like magic. This stuff gives me anxiety and a terrible nights sleep. The pill even looks super different even though it says the ingredients are the same. Very suspicious. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Do you have trouble sleeping?
customer_reviews.text: I take 2 of these every night before I go to bed to help me stay asleep through the night...do they work you ask...my husband makes sure I take them because then he gets sleep too!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Most helpful supplement for sleep!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have used it for over 10 years and I can def tell a difference when I don’t take them for sleep. I have found it helpful to take a brief 2-3 week break to let body rest and then start taking them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney

customer_reviews.title: Works slowly but very efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This got me back into sleeping for more than 5 hours at a time and falling back asleep in the middle of the night. Before trying it I was only getting 2 to 3 hours of sleep/night and was desperate. I think it did reset my internal clock. I take it one hour before bedtime. Of course I also do not take any caffeine or alcohol while taking it.
customer_reviews.author: M Brookman

customer_reviews.title: Not 30 in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but this seller jipped me. There are NOT 30 in the bottle, only 12
customer_reviews.author: Grace Karman

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: SOY
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two packages of these and never would've thought there would be soy in them but there is and its a huge allergy to a lot of people. Just threw the rest of my bottle away.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A Silvis

customer_reviews.title: Best Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had such a positive experience with any supplement I’ve ever taken. I’ve been taking this for six weeks and it’s incredible. My sleep patterns were better within week one as well as my over all calm mood. I also suffer from PMDD and this has helped dramatically. Can not recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My Naturopath had me start taking this because my Cortisol number were off. It has totally helped my sleeping! Wouldn't go to bed without it!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ann

customer_reviews.title: and am very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I believe these definitely help reduce my anxiety when I start to feel stressed. I have ordered them twice now, and am very happy with the results. I have many intolerances and allergies and often have reactions to food and supplements, but have never had any issue taking these. I'm sure I will be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Like a Baby
customer_reviews.text: I sleep like a baby when I take these. I have been taking for around 1 month. I’ve lost 6 pounds with little changes to my diet and lifestyle. I had recently lost 35 pounds, but due to high levels of stress I had gained 10 back. Thankfully this has helped me gain back control and I’m 4 pounds away from my target weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product to reset sleep
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for resetting cortisol cycle and turning your brain off at night so you can sleep. This is a pharmaceutical grade manufacturer, so those TV investigators won't find rat poo or sawdust in these supplements. They're the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really great to get me through those moments
customer_reviews.text: dr recommended/prescribed for stress that came up while traveling. really great to get me through those moments, and also good when i need to wind down to sleep (he mentioned that's what he normally offers it to patients for).. it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Malina

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice feeling! I’m going to bed
customer_reviews.text: Well, after being stressed for awhile now, I decided to buy this after reading reviews. I received today, and took one at 9:30 tonight. An hour has now passed, and OMG! I am sitting here ready for bed. ( I’m usually a night owl). I feel so relaxed right now with not a care in the world. This is a nice feeling! I’m going to bed. I’m going to like these. Goodnight everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Hairdiva48

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product! I have been taking it every night ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I have been taking it every night before bed. I sleep more soundly and I am calmer throughout the day. I have had problems with anxiety, which is enough reason to take this, but I also quit smoking after 29 years a few weeks ago and it was recommended to me. I believe it is helping with my detox symptoms to a fair degree by helping me sleep and possibly even helping with my restless leg symptoms a little bit. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I first got Cortisol Manager from my chiropractor. It works for me really well when I have too much adrena in my body and it wakes me up in the middle of the night. Great product. Will definatly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SHL

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This really does help me chill out before bedtime and start getting naturally sleepy on time. I take one a few hours before winding down and then another about an hour before bed with melatonin and sleepy time tea. Works great for a serious insomniac.
customer_reviews.author: WhatsInAName?

customer_reviews.title: Sleep better
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and find if I let it run out, I don't sleep or feel as well as when I take it daily. It's made a huge difference in my sleep. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Bottle too big
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I do not like the packaging. What a waste of space. Less than half container is filled with the pills. Either reduce the bottle size or double the amount of pills. Packaging should be mindful of waste.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Withdrawal has been agony
customer_reviews.text: I would *highly* discourage anyone from taking this product. I started taking it every night about a year ago; it worked to help me sleep better for about 2 months. Then it stopped working. I've been wanting to discontinue it for a while given that it's expensive, I don't really know what it contains or how it might be harming me, and it's not working! I tried to go off it about a week ago, and it has been hell! I'm up sweating at night, my skin is tingly and crawling, I'm exhausted during the day and completely awake at night! I wish I'd never messed with my system by taking this! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: It works if you don't use it every day.... can't sleep sometimes it works... doesn't work every day.
customer_reviews.author: William Boone

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: didn’t notice any effect at all i’ll not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Physician assistant impressed with product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to allow for deeper sleep. As a physician assistant myself, I found stress to be causing loss of sleep and cortisol is known to cause a variety of health problems. I looked up all the ingredients in the formulation on Wikipedia, and I was really excited to see apoptosis, anti-tumor, anti-inflammatory, anti-anxiety benefits widely known for the major ingredients. Very impressed so far, about a week into nightly use about an hour before bed time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep, less anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Helps me sleep for longer periods of time (I wake up a lot all night) and has reduced my anxiety during the day. It took a couple weeks to really feel the benefits but I can definitely tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much better and full of energy
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely tell a difference when I take the cortisol manager. I feel so much better and full of energy. Won't be missing a dosage if I can help it!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I have problem adrenal glands and produce too much cortisol late afternoon and evening. This product takes my cortisol levels down and helps me sleep better.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product. It is fabulous just before bed. Helps me sleep.

customer_reviews.title: Calming, but not helpful for sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased per doctors order. Doesn’t seem to help/affect sleep, but does make you feel more calm during the day. Good supplement to have during more stressful days. No side affects.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Improved Sleep Better Dreams
customer_reviews.text: I have slept so much better since taking these supplements. I have taken 2 on a couple of stressful days and they really relax me. They help me fall asleep but I also wake up less frequently. My insane vivid anxiety dreams have also become less intense and more manageable.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep and not feeling upset all the time
customer_reviews.text: This product helps me get sleep; I feel like I haven't slept in over a year. I started using this product and after about 2 month of using it I was sleeping a lot better. I stopped taking it as its not cheep to buy and I noticed after awhile I wasn't sleeping again, So I reorder it & I started feeling better and sleeping again. I will keep buying this as it works where nothing else has even meds for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one actually may wrk well
customer_reviews.text: This one wrks very well to lower cortisol to enable you to sleep. If your cortisol is high when you go to bed, you cant sleep. Also, cortisol reads light. Try not to watch tv in the bedroom or have a gleaming alarm clock beside your sleep place. Summer v This is a 2nd review seperate from the prev one because I ordered more. This Wrks better than anything I have used that is not a perscription. I have learned from studies if you lower your Cortisol you fall asleep. If your Cortisol is to high at bedtime you CANNOT fall asleep. It is true search it.
customer_reviews.author: KVonHolten

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This should only be used by people that have been tested for stress that has caused adrenal glands to be overworked and not functioning properly. It has helped me a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: stringskahler

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: My holistic D. O., has recommended this product for me. I take it daily and have for many months. I order thru amazon bc it's convenient and it's sold at a good price point with free prime home delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. However you may have to increase the dosage depending on your stress levels. I have taken this off and on for several years and always keep it in hand. However I suspect that this causes my body to become more acidic. So my suggestion would be that if you're worried about your body's pH you may want to increase some raw vegetable juices in order to maintain pH
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: This product does help me sleep and I do think that it helps keep me calm during the day. I don't feel as anxious as I did before I stated taking this product . This is my third bottle and I will continue to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Horse pill size. It seemed ok in the beginning but didn't work well over all and not worth the money. Switched back to melatonin.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep and Stress reliever CORTISOL MANAGER🤗
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, CORTISOL MANAGER due to stress. My oncologist suggested I try it. I would stay wide awake until 6 AM. With treatment for chemo I also take it during the day too when I need extra rest. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me.. made my hot flashes worse and no difference in sleep. Wish I had not bought an entire bottle to find this out. Slight headache in the morning, hydration is a must if you take this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cortisol has been affected by a car accident. ...
customer_reviews.text: My cortisol has been affected by a car accident. This product really seems to help my cortisol to lower before I go to bed so I can fall asleep.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It takes a while to kick in. It's very similar to Theanine Serene by Source Naturals.

customer_reviews.title: Uninterrupted sleep at last
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Previously took Ambien, Ambien CR, Lunesta & Belsomra...I would still wake up through the night. This Cortisol Managet truly quiets my mind & allows me to sleep peacefully through the night. I would highly recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomei Household

customer_reviews.title: easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I take this at night before bed. Cortisol is supposed to help you decrease belly fat. I'm doing keto also-losing weight-but more importantly-i took 20 points off of my cholesterol, I'm no longer pre-diabetic and my liver enzymes are normal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for reducing appetite.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I used Relacore for years, but I found it was not working that well. I went on Amazon to see reviews of other products and I gave this one a try. It has been a week and my appetite has been cut in half- no cravings for candy, sugar, or my usual food items when I go off Coritsol. I've noticed that my belly is getting smaller and I am able to exercise at night again without being exhausted. I take one a day in the morning. I bought the 90 count today.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Christina II

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t notice any improvement.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a doctor. I was hoping that this would help with sleep, anxiety and stress but by the time I got to the end of the 30 day supply I didn’t notice any bit of improvement in any of these areas. I really needed this to help with sleep and unfortunately it was a huge disappointment.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product. It’s helped me with morning anxiety. I encourage anyone having the same problem, to give it a try. 👍🏻

customer_reviews.title: Getting a full, rested nights sleep....finally!
customer_reviews.text: I’m the lightest sleeper and going through some hormonal changes so waking up at 1am and not falling back to sleep until 4 is very fun. My friend suggested this and I take two pills every night and sleep like a rock and actually wake up before my alarm rings feeling refreshed. It’s the only thing I take now. Love it

customer_reviews.title: Cured chronic migraines!
customer_reviews.text: I had migraines every day for 7 years- no joke. My naturepath told me about this. I took it and cut my diet soda and my headaches disappeared. I needed the cortisol manager daily at first. Now I take it during times of intense stress or when I get headaches. It works every time.

customer_reviews.title: No help

customer_reviews.title: Breathing problems
customer_reviews.text: I took this about three hours ago for my anxiety and sudden tension and I feel pretty awful. An hour hour after taking it I didn't notice my breathing had become so low that I was about to black out. Don't know why this happened to me I'll take half of one tomorrow and see how I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jfghy

product_meta.title: Cortisol Manager Integrative Therapeutics Sleep, Stress, and Cortisol Support Supplement, Vegan, 90 Tablets
product_meta.description:
Size:90 Count (Pack of 1)| Style:OrdinaryPhosphatidylserine combined with calming herbs to reduce cortisol levels for all-day stress reduction and restful sleep. Cortisol Manager stress hormone stabilizer combines stress-reducing ingredients and cortisol-lowering botanicals to help reduce stress and relieve occasional sleeplessness. This safe, natural and non-habit forming formula increases the ability to fall asleep, stay asleep, and will not cause morning grogginess, while providing all-day stress reduction. 
Integrative medicine is a collaboration of safe and effective therapies from conventional and complementary medicine. Integrative practitioners look beyond symptoms to identify and address the root cause and work hand in hand with patients to develop a plan of care. This collaborative, wellness-driven approach often includes clinical nutrition - both through diet, and nutritional supplementation – and that’s where Integrative Therapeutics supplements come in. 
Integrative Therapeutics is one of the top-tier manufacturers of supplements in use by integrative practitioners today – including naturopathic, chiropractic, nutrition, acupuncture, as well as a variety of general health and specialty practitioners.
feature_bullets: SLEEP AND STRESS SUPPORT - Your quest for great sleep starts with Cortisol Manager. Featuring non-habit forming, stress-reducing ingredients such as Ashwagandha, L-Theanine, Magnolia, and Epimedium*.

STRESS HORMONE STABILIZER - Cortisol, also known as the “stress hormone,” is naturally at its highest levels in the morning, and declines throughout the day. Too much stimulus (i.e. stress), can knock these levels out of their natural rhythm. Cortisol Manager helps to support the body’s natural rise and fall of cortisol, resulting in feelings of relaxation and a more restful night’s sleep.*
ALLEVITATE FATIGUE - with no morning drowsiness and without diminishing daytime alertness.*
ADRENAL HEALTH SUPPORT - Your adrenal glands play a large role in regulating stress levels. Cortisol Manager helps to reduce stress and support adrenal health.*
